Blizzard.description: Heavy snow driven by fierce winds creates near-whiteout conditions.

Clear Skies.description: Bright blue skies stretch endlessly overhead with excellent visibility.

Cold Snap.description: A sudden drop in temperature brings biting cold that penetrates to the bone.

Dark Clouds.description: Heavy storm clouds gather overhead, casting the landscape in shadow.

Downpour.description: Torrential rain falls in heavy sheets, turning paths muddy and treacherous.

Fog.description: Dense mist blankets the area, reducing visibility to mere paces ahead.

Hail.description: Ice pellets fall from the sky with stinging force, you best seek shelter from their impact!

Heatwave.description: Oppressive heat beats down relentlessly, sapping energy with each step.
Heatwave.resting: Drink twice as much to avoid thirst

Heavy Showers.description: Steady, soaking rain falls in persistent waves across the region.

Intermittent Showers.description: Sunshine alternates with brief, refreshing rain showers throughout the day.

Light Showers.description: Gentle rain falls softly, bringing a fresh scent to the air.

Occasional Sunshine.description: Sunshine breaks through the clouds occasionally, providing brief moments of warmth.

Overcast.description: Gray clouds cover most of the sky, filtering the sunlight to a dim glow.

Snow.description: Steady snowfall blankets the ground, muffling sounds and slowing travel.

Thunderstorm.description: Lightning flashes across dark skies while thunder rumbles ominously overhead.

Strange Phenomena.description: The natural order seems disturbed - lights dance in impossible colors across the sky, winds carry whispers from unknown sources, or the very air itself feels charged with otherworldly energy.
Strange Phenomena.effects: The GM should describe the specific phenomenon and determine its effects on travel and rest.
